column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////There are a good amount of brunchable items on the menu
column2: our table tried a variation of a couple things. Definitely a "leave your diet" at home kind of menu. Got the pork belly tacos for myself
column3: they were delish. The manager? Came by and gave us an assortment of special hot sauces. It was flavorful
column4: filling and oozing with goodness! The Cinnabon burger is great for pics but I felt like it was a little too much going on. Chicken fried steak was large
